Headline: Brown Line Delays
ShortDescription: Brown Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier track conditions at Francisco. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Brown Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier track conditions at Francisco. 

Shuttle busses are available from Kimball to Southport to provide connecting service through the affected area.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
